item.title: New rewards for Fortune Bombing Event
item.description:
Dear players,
Since our "Fortune Bombing" event has received so much attention and participation from everyone, the Myth War team is glad to announce the new rewards for this event so as to give you something back for your continuous support.
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: Item Mall User Appreciation 2007
item.description:
Time for exchanging integrals: The day after EST Jan 1, 2008. You can log into our official website on EST Jan 5, 2008 to find out when you can obtain the appointed rewards.
All players who meet requirements can participate in the activity.
